+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/op.h"
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+
+REGISTER_OP("BatchNormalizeTraining")
+    .Input("input: T")
+    .Input("scale: T")
+    .Input("bias: T")
+    .Input("running_mean: Ref(T)")
body: I would recommend to output the current mean and variance directly. The update itself can happen in a different node in the graph with tf.assign_moving_average.
body_html: I would recommend to output the current mean and variance directly. The update itself can happen in a different node in the graph with tf.assign_moving_average.
body_text: I would recommend to output the current mean and variance directly. The update itself can happen in a different node in the graph with tf.assign_moving_average.
